elements.description:
### Usage
Footer Content Here
 ### Styling The following custom properties are also available for styling: Custom property | Description | Default :----------------|:-------------|:---------- `--px-tile-width` | Width of the whole tile | `20rem` `--px-tile-height` | Height of the whole tile | `17.93333rem` `--px-tile-thumbnail-width` | Width of the thumbnail portion | `20rem` `--px-tile-thumbnail-height` | Height of the thumbnail portion | `13.3333rem` `--px-tile-thumbnail-background-color` | Background color of the thumbnail portion | `white` `--px-tile-background-color` | Background color of the title bar at the bottom | `lightgray` `--px-tile-overlay-background-color` | Background color for the overlay of a hoverable tile | `black` `--px-tile-overlay-text-color` | Text color for the overlay of a hoverable tile | `white`

properties.name: hoverable
properties.description:
If true, hovering over the card will cause an overlay to appear
with more detailed information, including the description
and an optional slot for showing a footer at the bottom.

properties.name: _hovered
properties.description: Whether the tile is currently being hovered.

properties.name: title
properties.description: Main text label for the tile.

properties.name: description
properties.description:
Additional information to be displayed in the overlay of a hoverable card.
Only the first ~6 lines of text will be displayed, after which it will be truncated.

methods.name: _hover
methods.description: Method used internally for flipping the hovered status of a tile.

methods.name: attached
methods.description: Attach event listeners for hoverable tiles.

methods.name: detached
methods.description: Detach event listeners for hoverable tiles.

methods.name: _getClass
methods.description: Returns class to control overlay for hoverable tiles.

with more detailed information, including the description
